00075 #include <cfg/os.h>
00076 #include <cfg/chat.h>
00077 #include <stdint.h>
00078 
00079 #define CHAT_ARG_SEND           0
00080 #define CHAT_ARG_ABORT          1
00081 #define CHAT_ARG_TIMEOUT        2
00082 #define CHAT_ARG_REPORT         3
00083 
00087 #ifndef CHAT_MAX_ABORTS
00088 #define CHAT_MAX_ABORTS         10
00089 #endif
00090 
00094 #ifndef CHAT_MAX_REPORT_SIZE
00095 #define CHAT_MAX_REPORT_SIZE    32
00096 #endif
00097 
00101 #ifndef CHAT_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
00102 #define CHAT_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT    45
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 typedef struct {
00106     int chat_fd;
00107     uint8_t chat_arg;
00108     uint8_t chat_aborts;
00109     char *chat_abort[CHAT_MAX_ABORTS];
00110     uint8_t chat_abomat[CHAT_MAX_ABORTS];
00111     char *chat_report_search;
00112     uint8_t chat_repmat;
00113     char chat_report_state;
00114 } NUTCHAT;
00115 
00116 extern uint8_t *chat_report;
